MasterAWBDetails.description: Master Air Waybill details including Air Waybill number, Freight Forwarder, Origin, Flight number, Destination and Airline

HouseWaybillDetails.description: House Waybill details including House Waybill number, number of pieces, SLAC, gross weight, shipper, consignee, nature of goods

TotalPieceCount.description: Total piece count of associated house waybills

TotalSLAC.description: Total SLAC of associated house waybills

TotalGrossWeight.description: Total gross weight of associated house waybills
